name: Wàng Wénài Shēng Yì
summary:
“This is a moderator simulator game.”
You play as an ordinary content reviewer at a fictional streaming platform, tasked with monitoring live chat messages for sensitive words.
If you spot one — hit the spacebar fast and take it down!
Miss one or make a wrong call, and your performance score will drop.
As for promotions and raises… well, there’s always a chance!
